description:
1. Click on Admin -> System -> External Service -> External Service -> Edit and modify the following parameter
username: support@cloudmicrofinance.com modify as support1@cloudmicrofinance.com.
and save the page.
2. Now Click on Admin -> users -> Create new user with valid inputs,
> Not able to save create user page displayed error message as "error.msg.user.email.invalid".
though valid email id is entered.
Proper error message should be displayed.
name: Mifos X Web App - Fix Inability To Create User If External Service Configuration Is Improper
